title: ServiceHub service manifest
description: The metadata of Cereon's out-of-process service.

Name.description: The name of the service. (must be the same as the one defined in the service moniker)

Version.description: The version of the service. (must be the same as the one defined in the service moniker)

Assembly.description: The assembly path of the service.

TypeName.description: The type name of the service.

Activation.description: How the service should be activated?
